short_description: This function predicts classification label using NaiveBayes model generated by TD_NaiveBayes.
long_description: This function predicts classification label using NaiveBayes model generated by TD_NaiveBayes.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input test data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input test data.

input_tables.name: modeltable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the model data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the model data.

argument_clauses.name: IDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the column that uniquely identifies an observation in the test table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the column that uniquely identifies an observation in the test table..

argument_clauses.name: NumericInputs
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the numeric attributes values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the numeric attributes values.

argument_clauses.name: CategoricalInputs
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the categorical attributes values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the categorical attributes values.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeNameColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the attributes names.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the attributes names.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the attributes values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the attributes values.

argument_clauses.name: Responses
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies a list of Responses to output.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies a list of Responses to output.

argument_clauses.name: OutputProb
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether the function should output the probability for each response.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether the function should output the probability for each response.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the names of the input table columns that need to be copied from the input test table to output.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the input table columns that need to be copied from the input test table to output.
